title: Sheet music PLEASEEEEEEE!!!!

embed.description: The official login screen for Pyke, the Bloodharbor Ripper.

body:
Now that you have added the official login screen, put this amazing champ into the game, can you please.. release the sheet music for his theme ? I would appreciate it a lot. I am a pianist and tried to make my own cover but i don't understand some parts, maybe because i don't have the best ear ..
_Ed the Conqueror_  you are amazing..  I really love your work, your songs are the best, i have learnt the Kindred{{champion:203}}  and the Camille {{champion:164}} theme on piano so far but i want to sing this song at a recital of mine.. so could you please.. release the sheet music?

           Thanks for reading.

replies.body:
Hey Tredu23!

Thanks for the kind words <3 Glad you like Pyke's music.

We'll make sure to release Pyke's music in an upcoming sheet music release. Stay tuned! It'll be sooner than later.

Ed the Conqueror

P.S.: for clarity's sake, while I did write Kindred's music, the amazing Chemicalseb penned Camille's login music
Is there a singer in his music, or do the violins mimic that?

> [{quoted}](name=Chromatic Eagle,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=notQH6QA,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-05-31T21:47:13.743+0000)
>
> Is there a singer in his music, or do the violins mimic that?

There is a singer in there - together with electric violin and cello!
It’s one of my favorite parts of the song. I love how you add some extra sound to make each piece memorable. Kayn and Urgot chants, Warwick howling, and so much more.

Okay I know this is random or you may not even see this but. 

I LOVE YOU SO MUCH FOR CREATING KINDRED’s MUSIC BECAUSE IT IS SIMPLY AMAZING I LOVE YOU THANK YOU Ed The Conqueror!
